channel.title: Posts on Digital History
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Digital History

item.title: Using Hugo and Github Like Good Friends
item.description: Using Hugo with Github Hugo is the program that compiles your web content (aka posts) into a website. Hugo is completely separate from Github. Not related in any way. All Hugo does is help you make a pretty website. So, we can go to our terminal and enter the site directory by issuing the command cd ~/Documents/digitalhistory.orphicoasis8.com Now we can use any text editor or VS code to edit our posts
